title: Mnemosyne: Mnemosyne no Musume-tachi (Rin: Daughters of Mnemosyne)
synopsis: Immortality is something many people would wish for. But would it be such a coveted ability if people knew they would be subject to countless attacks because of it? Such is the case for Rin Asougi, an immortal private investigator, because there is no shortage of people who want her dead. Over the centuries, she has met many grisly ends, but each time, she returns to life as if nothing had happened.
related_anime: ['Mnemosyne: Mnemosyne no Musume-tachi', 'Mnemosyne: Mnemosyne no Musume-tachi 2008']
voices: ['Noto, Mamiko', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Tanaka, Rie', 'Tanaka, Masahiko', 'Nazuka, Kaori', 'Nabatame, Hitomi']
